Text.Name: Optimistic
Text.Desc: Everything always seems to be on the up and up, am I right?

Text.Name: Pessimism
Text.Desc: This world is done for, why must we continue prolonging the inevitable?

Text.Name: Depressed
Text.Desc: It has no meaning, none of it...

Text.Name: Regret
Text.Desc: I really do regret it...if only things had been different. I just hope that my remaining years are full of pain, maybe that will bring just a bit of atonement.
Text.StoryDesc: As full of regret as always
